description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen called NoteListScreen, which displays a list of notes with search functionality, and supports navigation to note detail and editing screens.

classes.name: NoteListScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of notes with search, refresh, and navigation capabilities.

classes.name: _NoteListScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the note list, search, loading state, and navigation logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state by loading notes.

methods.name: _loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the service, optionally filtered by a search term.

methods.name: _onSearchChanged
methods.description: Handles search input changes and triggers note list update.

methods.name: _goToDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the note detail screen, then reloads notes after returning.

methods.name: _goToCreate
methods.description: Navigates to the note creation/edit screen, then reloads notes after returning.
